section.1: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir bin `Abdullah that:"A man passed by the Prophet while he was urinating, and greeted him by the Salam. The Messenger of Allah said to him: "If you see me in this situation, do not greet me with the Salam, for if you do that I will not respond to you
